trans-unit.source: (sudo) onlysnarf-config Then from within project's OnlySnarf directory either:
trans-unit.target: (sudo) onlysnarf-config Then from within project's OnlySnarf directory either:

trans-unit.source: Rename the file to "client_secrets.json" and place it into your installed OnlySnarf directory. To update your installation with the new file, run onlysnarf-config, select 'Update Google Creds', and enter the location of your "client_secret.json" file.
trans-unit.target: Rename the file to "client_secrets.json" and place it into your installed OnlySnarf directory. To update your installation with the new file, run onlysnarf-config , select 'Update Google Creds', and enter the location of your "client_secret.json" file.

trans-unit.source: Click 'Download JSON' on the right side of Client ID to download client_secret_<really long ID>.json.
trans-unit.target: Click 'Download JSON' on the right side of Client ID to download client_secret_<really long ID>.json.

trans-unit.source: Feel free to make use of my referral code ;)
trans-unit.target: 欢迎使用我的推荐代码;)

trans-unit.source: Generated by Google Drive's authentication process. Saves Google authentication for repeat access.
trans-unit.target: 由Google Drive的认证过程生成。保存谷歌认证,以便重复访问。

trans-unit.source: Go to APIs Console_ and make your own project.
trans-unit.target: Go to APIs Console _ and make your own project.

trans-unit.source: Now, the product name and consent screen need to be set -> click 'Configure consent screen' and follow the instructions. Once finished:
trans-unit.target: Now, the product name and consent screen need to be set -> click 'Configure consent screen' and follow the instructions. Once finished:

trans-unit.source: OnlyFans uses a captcha to prevent malicious bots from accessing user accounts. However, this captcha is only necessary when logging in with your OnlyFans username and password. Logging in with the provided Twitter authentication does not provide a captcha and thus allows a more accessible automated entrance.
trans-unit.target: OnlyFans使用验证码来防止恶意机器人访问用户账户。但是,只有在使用OnlyFans用户名和密码登录时,才需要这个验证码。使用提供的Twitter认证登录时,不提供验证码,因此可以更方便地自动进入。

trans-unit.source: OnlySnarf is a python based automation tool to assist with uploading content to OnlyFans. OnlySnarf is capable of downloading a file (image or video) or gallery of files (images) locally or from a remote location such as a [local or remote file system, Google Drive, ...] to upload to an OnlyFans account.
trans-unit.target: OnlySnarf是一个基于python的自动化工具,用于协助上传内容到OnlyFans。OnlySnarf能够在本地或从远程位置,如[本地或远程文件系统,Google Drive,...]下载文件(图片或视频)或文件库(图片),上传到OnlyFans账户。

trans-unit.source: Or include a 'config.conf' file located at '/opt/onlysnarf/config.conf' to set variables at runtime without using arguments. An example file has been provided. Please be sure to follow the key:value pattern. A starting # denotes a comment.
trans-unit.target: 或者包含一个位于'/opt/onlysnarf/config.conf'的'config.conf'文件,以便在运行时不使用参数设置变量。我们已经提供了一个示例文件。请确保遵循key:value模式。开头的#表示一个注释。

trans-unit.source: Path: /opt/onlysnarf/config.conf (previously /etc/onlysnarf/config.conf) Create or update the "config.conf" file with the following values:
trans-unit.target: 路径:/opt/onlysnarf/config.conf /opt/onlysnarf/config.conf (之前为/etc/onlysnarf/config.conf)使用以下值创建或更新 "config.conf "文件。

trans-unit.source: Search for 'Google Drive API', select the entry, and click 'Enable'.
trans-unit.target: 搜索 "Google Drive API",选择条目,然后点击 "启用"。

trans-unit.source: Select 'Credentials' from the left menu, click 'Create Credentials', select 'OAuth client ID'.
trans-unit.target: 从左侧菜单中选择'凭证',点击'创建凭证',选择'OAuth客户端ID'。

trans-unit.source: Tests configuration. Does not upload or remove from Google Drive.
trans-unit.target: 测试配置。不会从Google Drive上传或删除。

trans-unit.source: Text will be generated if not provided with -text* 12 * * * onlysnarfpy -category image -text "Your mother is a dirty whore"
trans-unit.target: Text will be generated if not provided with -text * 12 * * * onlysnarfpy -category image -text "Your mother is a dirty whore"

trans-unit.source: Upload a random gallery of images every Wednesday at 2:30pm:
trans-unit.target: 每周三下午2:30随机上传图片库。

trans-unit.source: Upload a random image once a day at noon:
trans-unit.target: 每天中午随机上传一次图片。

trans-unit.source: Upload a random video every Friday in the month of June at 6:00pm:
trans-unit.target: 6月份每周五下午6点随机上传一段视频。
上传一个标签为:'文件夹名-%d%m%y'的图库。
上传一个视频,标签为:'文件夹名-%d%m%y'。
上载一段标有:"你妈妈 "的视频。

trans-unit.source: Used to facilitate Google Drive's python authentication. Requires generating an app w/ credentials via Google Console. Credentials are authenticated once and then saved to "google_creds.txt".
trans-unit.target: 用于方便Google Drive的python认证。需要通过Google Console生成一个应用程序/凭证。凭证认证一次,然后保存到 "google_creds.txt"。

trans-unit.source: When downloading/uploading from a Google Drive account this package requires configuring a Google App with PyDrive for access to your Google Drive. The Drive API requires OAuth2.0 for authentication.
trans-unit.target: When downloading/uploading from a Google Drive account this package requires configuring a Google App with PyDrive for access to your Google Drive. The Drive API requires OAuth2.0 for authentication.

trans-unit.source: a. Select 'Application type' to be Web application. b. Enter an appropriate name. c. Input http://localhost:8080 for 'Authorized JavaScript origins'. d. Input http://localhost:8080/ for 'Authorized redirect URIs'. e. Click 'Create'.
trans-unit.target: a. Select 'Application type' to be Web application. b. Enter an appropriate name. c. Input http://localhost:8080 for 'Authorized JavaScript origins'. d. Input http://localhost:8080/ for 'Authorized redirect URIs'. e. Click 'Create'.

trans-unit.source: password -> the Twitter conencted to your OnlyFans's password
trans-unit.target: password -> the Twitter conencted to your OnlyFans's password

trans-unit.source: username -> the Twitter connected to your OnlyFans's username
trans-unit.target: username -> the Twitter connected to your OnlyFans's username
